title: Riding on a Beam of Light
description: Albert Einstein believed in imagination and never lost his child-like sense of wonder of the world around him. This children's book for 4 to 8 year old boys and girls, transport readers into a young Albert Einstein's fantastical world of adventure. The story and artwork will capture the imagination and hearts of kids and the adults reading to them. Beautifully illustrated, this is sure to become a modern classic in the tradition of Harold and the Purple Crayon and Where The Wild Things Are. "If you want your children to be smart, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be smarter, read them more fairy tales." - Albert Einstein
author: Ramsey Dean
